species.name: helioptile
descriptions: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.
The sun powers this Pokémon’s electricity generation. Interruption of that process stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.
They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokémon’s electric moves.

abilities.name: dry-skin
abilities.effect: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25×, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

abilities.name: solar-power
abilities.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.
